column2: geom_point(aes(x = `Miles Driven`,y = `Cost Per Mile`), color = GRAY9, size = 2.5) +
labels = scales::dollar_format()) + #scales is a package, dollarformat adds the signs
geom_point(x = avg_miles, y = avg_cost, size=3.5) + #you could specify coordinates here too
hjust = 1.25) + #use the h and v adjustment to move it around
labs(title = "Cost per mile by miles driven", x = "Miles driven per month", y = "Cost per mile") +
